title: Navigate forwards to a collapsed select-only combobox in reading mode
task: navigate forwards to collapsed select-only combobox
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the Combobox
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link
assertion1: navigate to the 'Favorite Fruit' Combobox.
assertion2: Role 'combobox' is conveyed
assertion3: Name 'Favorite Fruit' is conveyed
assertion4: Text of the selected option ('Choose a Fruit') is conveyed
assertion5: State of the combobox (collapsed) is conveyed

title: Open a collapsed select-only combobox in reading mode
task: open collapsed select-only combobox
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on the combobox
instructions: With the reading cursor on the combobox, open the combobox.

assertion2: Role of the popup ('listbox') is conveyed
assertion3: Name of the popup ('Favorite Fruit') is conveyed
assertion4: Text of the focused option in the popup ('Choose a Fruit') is not conveyed
assertion5: 2:State of the focused option in the popup (selected) is conveyed
assertion6: Position of the focused option in the popup (1) is conveyed
assertion7: Number of options in the popup (13) is conveyed
